      void MainController.loadRLE()
      loadRLE public void loadRle() opens a FileChooser which lets you select and load a RLE file to the game board.

      readGameBoard public void readGameBoard(BufferedReader br) Reads each line in the file, and adds it to the String ArrayList, the data read is added at the end of the array.

      setPatternFormat public void setPatternFormat(Integer topLeftX, Integer topLeftY, Boolean XLifeFormat) Sets the format of the pattern which is either Xlife or Life32
      void PatternFormat.setPatternRule(java.lang.String ruleString)
      setPatternRule public void setPatternRule(String ruleString) Sets the rule of the pattern, which decides how many cells survive or dies.
      void PatternFormat.setPatternSize(int width, int height)
      setPatternSize public void setPatternSize(Integer width, Integer height) An array is created using the dimension of the pattern specified in the loaded file.
